name: Recruitment for the Post of Vidyut Sahayak (Electrical Assistant)

eligibility.age_limit: For Unreserved Category: 30 years; For Reserved Category: 35 years as of 01-01-2025
eligibility.education: Full-time B.E./B.Tech in Electrical Engineering from a recognized university with a minimum of 55% for unreserved category and 50% for reserved category candidates

fee.amount: ₹500 for UR, SEBC, and EWS candidates; ₹250 for SC/ST candidates

contact_details.address: Paschim Gujarat Vij Seva Sadan, Off. Nana Mava Main Road, Laxminagar, Rajkot-360004

eligibility.education: Full-time B.E./B.Tech in Computer Science/Information Technology or MCA from a recognized university with a minimum of 55% for unreserved category and 50% for reserved category candidates
